form.label: 2.üîß Manage the Rerun backlog
form.description: This dashboard is used to manage the current detection backfill backlog

input.label: Action
input.choice: Remove a task from the backlog

table.title: This is the current list of detection backfill already setup within the backlog to be processed

search.query: | inputlookup detection_backfill_rerun_backlog | lookup detection_backfill_spl_code_injections id as bf_spl_code_injection_id OUTPUT name as bf_spl_code_injection_name | eval dispatch_time = strftime(dispatch_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %z"), bf_created_time = strftime(bf_created_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %z"), bf_spl_code_injection_id = "("+bf_spl_code_injection_id+") "+bf_spl_code_injection_name, bf_trigger = if(bf_trigger==1,"Yes","No"), last_refresh = "$last_refresh$", action=case("list"=="remove","‚ùå Remove this instance",1==1,"-") | fillnull value="None" bf_spl_code_injection_id | where match(app,"$filter_app$") AND match(savedsearch,"$filter_savedsearch$") | table batch_name, bf_batch_id, bf_uid, batch_priority, app, savedsearch, dispatch_time, bf_spl_code_injection_id, bf_trigger, bf_created_time, bf_created_author, action | rename app as "App", savedsearch as "Savedsearch", bf_batch_id as "Batch ID", batch_name as "Batch name", bf_spl_code_injection_id as "SPL Injection code", bf_trigger as "Trigger actions", bf_created_author as "Batch created by", bf_created_time as "Batch created on", batch_priority as "Priority", dispatch_time as "Will be rerun on (dispatch time)", action as "Action"

table.fields: ["Batch name","Batch ID","Priority","App","Savedsearch","Will be rerun on (dispatch time)","SPL Injection code","Trigger actions","Batch created on","Batch created by","Action"]
